mapper.update: update borrow set return_date=now() where user_id=#{userId} and book_id=#{bookId}
mapper.delete: delete from borrow where user_id=#{userId} and book_id=#{bookId}
mapper.select: select Bw.user_id userId,Bw.book_id bookId, Bw.borrow_date borrowDate, Bw.return_date returnDate, u.username username, b.name bookname from borrow Bw left join book b on Bw.book_id=b.id left join user u on Bw.user_id=u.id
